pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simple raw data generator based on user-specified summary statistics. // MorseGen is a program for generating raw data based on user-specified summary (descriptive) statistics. Samples based on the supplied statistics are drawn from a normal distribution (or, in some cases, an exponential distribution) and scaled to match the desired descriptive statistics. Intended uses include creating raw data that fits desired characteristics or to replicate the results in a published study.
